risk_categories.name: Strategis
risk_categories.description: Strategic business risks affecting long-term objectives and competitive positioning

risk_categories.name: Operasional
risk_categories.description: Operational and process risks that affect day-to-day business operations

risk_categories.name: Keuangan
risk_categories.description: Financial and budget risks including cash flow, investment, and financial reporting

risk_categories.name: Kepatuhan
risk_categories.description: Compliance and regulatory risks related to laws, regulations, and industry standards

risk_categories.name: Proyek
risk_categories.description: Project-specific risks including scope, timeline, resource, and deliverable risks

risk_categories.name: Lingkungan & Sosial
risk_categories.description: Environmental and social risks including sustainability and community impact

risk_categories.name: Teknologi Informasi
risk_categories.description: IT and technology risks including cybersecurity, system failure, and data integrity

risk_categories.name: Sumber Daya Manusia
risk_categories.description: Human resource risks including talent management, skills gap, and personnel issues

risk_categories.name: Vendor
risk_categories.description: Third-party and vendor risks including supplier reliability and contract management

risk_categories.name: Reputasi
risk_categories.description: Reputation and brand risks that could affect public perception and stakeholder trust
